exec: tests["projectName"] = jsonData.projects[0].projectName === "Create Project From Postman" || "Create Project for Test Apply";
tests["description4"] = jsonData.commonLookups[4].description === "When another Philance members messages a user";
tests["description5"] = jsonData.commonLookups[5].description === "When a project application is approved/rejected";
tests["description6"] = jsonData.commonLookups[6].description === "When a updates are available on project";
tests["description7"] = jsonData.commonLookups[7].description === "Applicant applied for a project";
tests["description8"] = jsonData.commonLookups[8].description === "Applicant approved for a project";
tests["description8"] = jsonData.commonLookups[8].description === "Applicant approved for a project";
tests["description9"] = jsonData.commonLookups[9].description === "Applicant being reviewed for a project";
tests["description10"] = jsonData.commonLookups[10].description === "Applicant rejected for a project";
tests["description18"] = jsonData.commonLookups[18].description === "All freelancers who support fulfill a project";
tests["description19"] = jsonData.commonLookups[19].description === "Person who creates a project";
tests["description20"] = jsonData.commonLookups[20].description === "Person who funds a project";
